item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is only one sin. and that is theft... when you tell a lie, you steal someones right to the truth." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "And that's the thing about people who mean everything they say. They think everyone else does too." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Children aren't coloring books. You don't get to fill them with your favorite colors." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Like a compass needle that points north, a man's accusing finger always finds a woman. Always." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I wondered if that was how forgiveness budded; not with the fanfare of epiphany, but with pain gathering its things, packing up, and slipping away unannounced in the middle of the night." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Hana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I cannot imagine a God who rewards and punishes the objects of his creation, whose purposes are modeled after our own -- a God, in short, who is but a reflection of human frailty. Neither can I believe that the individual survives the death of his body, although feeble souls harbor such thoughts through fear or ridiculous egotisms." -- Albert Einstein
